title: Travis Scott’s Rumored Mistress Denies Involvement in The Rapper's Breakup with Kylie Jenner
text:
From Seventeen

Ever since the news broke that Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott broke up after two years and one baby together, people have been scrambling to find the cause. At first, many thought the split occurred so that Kylie could get back with her ex, Tyga, but the beauty mogul quickly put those rumors to rest. Now, though, it seems like someone else is being blamed for the breakup.

One Instagram, that has since been deleted, was dedicated to proving that Travis Scott was having an affair with Rojean Kar while dating Kylie. It posted multiple photos showing that Travis and Rojean were in the same location at similar times, and shared images of them wearing the same tee shirts on multiple occasions.

Fed up with the rumors that she had something to do with the split, Rojean took to her private Instagram to clear her name.

"None of these rumors are true, it's just the internet creating a false narrative," she wrote on her stories. "Please stop spreading lies & leave him, her & I alone because it's affecting real lives. Thank you."

"Yungsweetro" posted something about rumors between Travis Scott and her. She said everything is fake. Waht do you think?💆 pic.twitter.com/M6VkdNQRnr — BADGALIGGY👑🍒 (@Badgaliggy) October 3, 2019

This was also reiterated by a source from Us Weekly that said, "any rumors of cheating are totally and completely false."

According to E! News, the break up came because the Travis and Kylie were "fighting again." A People source added that the couple was having issues because Kylie wanted a second baby, but Travis wasn't as on board. "She still has trust issues with Travis," the source said. "He hasn’t been giving her the commitment that she needs."

Follow Carolyn on Instagram.
